description: Instantly cover unwanted grays and roots or fill in thinning areas for fuller-looking hair. Our talc-free, water & sweat resistant formula clings to hair strands to absorb excess oil and give you flawless-looking locks that last all day.
opinions: This product is amazing! It covers my roots perfectly and lasts all day.
I love the different color options available to match my hair perfectly.
The formula is lightweight and doesn't make my hair feel greasy or heavy.
I wish they offered a larger size option for those of us who use it frequently.
